DOC.brief_summary: Patients randomize 3 group : two intervent group control group . The first group receive two week daily session repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( rTMS , 10 session ) , least 6 month , two week daily transcranial Direct Current Stimulation ( tDCS , 10 session ) ; second group receive 10 daily session tDCS , least 6 month , 10 session rTMS ; control group receive 10 daily session sham tDCS . Physiatric evaluation ( ARAT scale ) , neuropsychological assessment ERP ( P300 ) perform ( 1 week ) ( 1 week ) end treatment . Furthermore , patient underwent follow-up neuropsychological assessment 6 month end stimulation period follow-up physiatric evaluation 3 6 month end stimulation period .
